info.brief_description: I noticed there wasn't one like this on writing.com so i made it
info.description:
rules

if you end the story, there must be a option to start a new story with the same character

for example

if you save the character or
the character dies

you must put a option to allow a new story to happen with them all over again
and it cant link to the previous story


no females have to be included


other that that i will probably allow it
